ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.actor.items

Class GameItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.actor.items.GameItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Collectable, FreezePowerDown, ImmortalPowerUp, Obstacle

    public abstract class GameItem
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
implements GameObject
    A GameItem represents an item on the stage the Player can interact with. It could be a obstacle, collectable, powerup etc. This class has most of the boiler plate code like creation, setup, clipping and other utility methods. Sub classes currently only need to override the destroy method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameItem(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
      Sets the texture for drawing and correctly sets bounds, origin and y position.

      void addAction(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Action action) 
      protected abstract void destroy()
      Will remove the item from the stage and also handle the disposal.
      void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch, float parentAlpha) 
      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle getBounds()
      Will create a new Rectangle based on the current x and y coordinates and the width and height of the gameItem.
      void handleCollision(CollisionType collisionType)
      In case the obstacle collides with something it will be removed and GameObjectFactory.destroyObstacle(Obstacle) is called.
      void handleEffects()
      This method will be called upon handleCollision(CollisionType) in case a GameItem should have additional effects for example a powerup.
      protected void positionChanged()
